definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Bamboo industry is a prop one in the county.
sentences.chinese: 竹業是順昌縣支柱產業。

sentences.english: Auto and motorcycle industry is the first pillar industry of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 汽摩工業是重慶的第一支柱產業。

sentences.english: Chongqing medical industry becomes one of the top 5 pillar industries in Chongqing district.
sentences.chinese: 重慶醫藥行業已成爲重慶地區的五大支柱產業之一。

sentences.english: Finally the author puts forward some suggestions to speed up the development of backbone industries for geological prospecting units.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了加速地礦部門支柱產業發展的若干建議。

sentences.english: Tourist industry is becoming a pillar industry of Tongren economy.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業將成爲銅仁經濟發展的支柱產業。

sentences.english: Yellow Smoke production has become a pillar industry in Nanxiong.
sentences.chinese: 黃煙生產已成爲南雄的支柱產業。

sentences.english: The tea history in Anxi County is long, tea is the most important industry in Anxi County.
sentences.chinese: 安溪縣具有悠久的茶歷史，茶業也是當地的支柱產業。

sentences.english: Produce the dish fruit to classify as the rural key pillar industry in Yang County.
sentences.chinese: 洋縣把菜果生產列爲農村重點支柱產業。

sentences.english: International trade is one of the pillar industries of BETC.
sentences.chinese: 國際貿易是遠東騰輝的支柱產業之一。

sentences.english: Prawn aquaculture is the industry of important economy pillar of Asia area.
sentences.chinese: 對蝦養殖業是東南亞地區的重要經濟支柱產業。

sentences.english: Stone industry is one of the main characteristic pillar industries of Hezhou.
sentences.chinese: 石材產業是賀州主要特色支柱產業之一。

sentences.english: The real estate industry has already become one of the pillar industries in China in 21C.
sentences.chinese: 房地產行業已成爲中國21世紀的支柱產業。

sentences.english: Feed industry is one of the most important industries in agricultural economy.
sentences.chinese: 飼料行業是農業經濟中的支柱產業。

sentences.english: The forest product already becomes one of Youyang economy development pillar industries.
sentences.chinese: 林產業已成爲酉陽經濟發展的支柱產業之一。

sentences.english: Automobile industry is a pillar industry having direct implications on the national economy and the people' s livelihood .
sentences.chinese: 汽車工業是一個關係到國計民生的支柱產業。

sentences.english: Mining industry was one of the important pillar industries in Song County, He nan Province.
sentences.chinese: 採礦業是河南省嵩縣的重要支柱產業之一。

definition: industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
